entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow or ice pellets beginning near midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow or ice pellets. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022
